column4: Hey guys, I was wondering what the fastest Ubuntu based distro is
like kevdog said, crunchbang is designed for speed, whether or not it's actually the fastest, i have no idea
i don't believe so, and they haven't released a 9.04 version if i remember correctly
i second that, openbox would be faster.  HOWEVER, xfce is plenty fast, unless you're on a 386....
